page.title: 03GAMES AND LEISURE, SEAMILL
page.content: In{Seamill}most young people tend to play in{back gardens}at a variety of games, eg. football, tennis, badminton, rounders and tig.{Leveo}is played at night: two teams (one hiding and one seeking) aim, to either catch or avoid being caught. If caught, member of own team enters den and shouts "Leveo 123" thus freeing the captive. The{Golf Course}is in Seamill. It costs about Â£45 for a junior and over Â£100 for seniors. There are two putting greens. {Water sports}are very popular because Seamill is on the sea front. Windsurfing, rowing, canoeing, swimming, snorkling and sub-aqua are amongst the most popular.{Portencross is a favourite spot for cycling to and fishing and swimming while there. Hiking and hillwalking are other outdoor activities.
